question: You are having problems with a neighbour’s animals because the fence between your properties is old and In poor repair. You want the neighbour to pay half the cost of building a new fence.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your lettersay what the problems areexplain how a new fence will solve the problemssuggest that the neighbour pays half of the cost
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that your pet dog is giving me trouble with the fence between our properties. I think  we will repair the railing so that problem can be solved.

The problem I am having is that  the railing quality is poor and not in good condition but your pup always trying to jump over the barbed wire. Last week, your pup jumped on it and broke it. Apart from this issue, we will fix the new rail instead of repairing the  one old. I think  it will solve the problem that your puppy makes. First, we will see different fences such as  rigid steel with good quality so it will stay up to last long. I know, the price of it is a bit high but it will only solve the issue between us.
I want to suggest you  give me half price of the bar because your puppy gives that expenses but I think it will solve after putting new shade.
I hope you agree with the letter, and also I am providing you bank cheque inside the envelope.
